name: Chicken Afritada Recipe
description: This is a recipe for Filipino Afritadang Manok.
author: Vanjo Merano
step1: - 1 ½ lbs. Chicken cut into serving pieces
step13: - Salt and ground black pepper to taste
f1: Step 1: Heat the oil in a cooking pot. Saute onion and garlic until the onion softens.
f2: Step 2: Add chicken. Cook for 30 seconds. Turn it over and cook the other side for another 30 seconds.
f3: Step 3: Pour tomato sauce and chicken broth. Cover. Let boil.
f4: Step 4: Add dried bay leaves. Cover the cooking pot. Continue to cook in medium heat for 30 minutes.
f5: Step 5: Add hotdogs and carrot. Cook for 3 minutes.
f6: Step 6: Add potato. Cover the pot and cook for 8 minutes.
f7: Step 7: Add green peas. Cook for 2 minutes.
f8: Step 8: Season with salt and ground black pepper

name: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
author: Vanjo Merano
f2: Step 2: Combine the ground cumin with the shredded chicken. Mix well. Set aside.
f3: Step 3: Meanwhile, scoop around 1/2 cup of enchilada sauce and pour in a baking dish. Spread the sauce all over the dish.
f4: Step 4: Lay four pieces of flour tortilla over the enchilada sauce. Spread some refried beans and sour cream over the tortilla. Arrange half of the shredded chicken on top and then top with cheese and enchilada sauce.
f5: Step 5: Make the next layer by arranging four pieces of flour tortilla on top of the enchilada sauce. Do the same step as in the first layer by spreading refried beans and sour cream over the tortillas. Top with the remaining chicken. Add cheese and enchilada sauce on top.
f6: Step 6: Make the last layer by arranging the last 4 flour tortilla pieces over the enchilada sauce. Spread the remaining refried beans, sour cream, and enchilada sauce. Top with Monterey jack cheese.
f7: Step 7: Bake the Chicken Enchilada Casserole for 35 to 40 minutes.
f8: Step 8: Remove from the oven. Serve.

name: Chicken Liver and Gizzard Adobo
author: Vanjo Merano
f1: Step 1: Boil the chicken gizzard in 4 cups of water (covered) for 60 to 90 minutes. Drain the water and set aside.
f2: Step 2: Sprinkle 1 teaspoon garlic powder and 1/4 teaspoon salt all over the chicken liver. Let it stay for 10 minutes.
f3: Step 3: Heat the cooking oil in a frying pan.
f4: Step 4: Dredge the chicken liver in all-purpose flour. Pan fry for 2 minutes per side. Remove the pan-fried chicken liver. Set aside.
f5: Step 5: On the same pan using the remaining oil, add the garlic, Cook until the color turns light brown.
f6: Step 6: Put-in the gizzard and pan-fried liver. Stir.
f7: Step 7: Add the soy sauce and water. Let boil.
f8: Step 8: Add the bay leaves and whole peppercorn. Cover and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes.
f9: Step 9: Add the vinegar. Let the liquid re-boil. Stir and cook for 5 minutes.
f10: Step 10: Turn the heat off. Transfer to a serving plate.

name: Chicken Lollipop Recipe
author: Vanjo Merano
f1: Step 1: Divide the chicken wing into 3 parts by slicing through the joints. Set aside the wingtip for other possible uses.
f2: Step 2: Shape the wing to look like a lollipop. You should have two parts of the chicken wing by now: the one with a single bone and the one with two bones. Start by selecting the part with one bone.
f3: Step 3: Separate the meat from the bone by sliding a sharp knife around the tip of the bone where meat is still connected (do not cut through the bone).
f4: Step 4: Place the wing vertically on top of a flat surface while holding the part where the knife passed.
f5: Step 5: Gently push downward while gripping the bone with your thumb and index finger until the meat slides down.
f6: Step 6: Arrange the meat by inverting the inner part until a lollipop shape is formed. Note: Do the same procedure for the part with two bones. However, you need to first detach the smaller bone before commencing.
f7: Step 7: Season the chicken lollipops with salt and pepper and let it stand for at least 15 minutes.
f8: Step 8: Crack the eggs and transfer to a bowl then whisk, and gradually add-in the all-purpose flour while whisking until a batter is formed.
f9: Step 9: Dip the chicken lollipop on the batter then to the Panko breadcrumbs.
f10: Step 10: Heat oil in a cooking pot then deep-fry the chicken lollipop under medium heat until the color of the outer part turns medium brown (about 10 to 12 minutes).
f11: Step 11: Remove the fried chicken lollipop from the cooking pot and transfer to a dish with paper towel. Let it stand until excess oil is absorbed by the paper towel.

name: Chicken Mami Recipe
author: Vanjo Merano
step12: - Salt and ground black pepper to taste
f1: Step 1: Combine chicken breast, onion.and 2 quarts water. Let the water boil.
f2: Step 2: Add Knorr Chicken Cube. Continue to boil for 40 minutes between low to medium heat.
f3: Step 3: While the chicken is cooking, prepare the toasted garlic. Combine crushed garlic and cooking oil in a small pan or pot. Turn the heat on and cook slowly while stirring until garlic browns. Filter the garlic using a kitchen sieve. Note: Save the oil to cook other dishes
f4: Step 4: Heat 1 quart water in a small pot. Let boil. Add fresh noodles. Cook for 1 minute. Discard water. Arrange noodles in serving bowls, including Napa cabbage, carrot, and egg.
f5: Step 5: Once the chicken cooks completely, remove from the pot. Separate the meat from the bone and let it cool down. Slice the chicken into serving pieces.
f6: Step 6: Arrange the noodles, vegetable, and chicken in a serving bowl. Pour hot broth and top with chopped green onions and toasted garlic. Serve. Share and enjoy!

name: Chicken Pastel Recipe
description: This is a recipe for Filipino Chicken Pastel
author: Vanjo Merano
step14: - Salt and ground black pepper to taste
f1: Step 1: Combine chicken, lemon juice, and soy sauce in a bowl. Mix well. Marinate for 15 minutes.
f2: Step 2: Melt butter in a cooking pot. Once the butter start to bubble, add the marinated chicken. Include the marinade. Stir and cook for 2 minutes.
f3: Step 3: Add chorizo de bilbao. Cook for 5 minutes.
f4: Step 4: Pour water. Let boil. Add Knorr Chicken Cube. Stir and cook for 12 minutes.
f5: Step 5: Add beef frank, carrot, potato, and mushroom. Cook for 2 minutes.
f6: Step 6: Pour table cream. Stir until well blended. Cook for 5 minutes.
f7: Step 7: Season with salt and pepper.
f9: Step 9: Transfer the chicken pastel to a baking pan or oven-proof container. Cover with pie dough. Poke holes on the dough for steam to escape.
f11: Step 11: Remove from the oven. Serve.

name: Chicken Pochero Recipe
description: Chicken stewed in tomato sauce with chorizo, potato, and green vegetables. It is a comfort food best enjoyed for lunch with hot rice.
author: Vanjo Merano
step1: - 2 lbs. Chicken cut into serving pieces
step16: Fish sauce and crushed peppercorn to taste
f1: Step 1: Heat oil in a cooking pot. Pan-fry the chicken for 2 minutes per side. Set aside.
f2: Step 2: Using the remaining oil, saute onion and garlic.
f3: Step 3: Add chorizo. Saute for 1 minute.
f4: Step 4: Add tomato. Continue to saute until onion and tomato softens.
f5: Step 5: Put the pan-fried chicken back into the pot. Stir.
f6: Step 6: Pour tomato sauce and water.Let boil.
f7: Step 7: Add Knorr Chicken Cube. Stir and cover the pot. Cook in medium heat for 15 minutes.
f8: Step 8: Put potato, saba banana, and chick pea into the pot. Cover and cook for 12 minutes.
f9: Step 9: Add long green beans and cabbage. Cover and cook for 3 minutes.
f10: Step 10: Add bok choy. Cook for 2 minutes. Season with crushed peppercorn and fish sauce. Stir.
f11: Step 11: Tranfer to a serving bowl. Share and enjoy!

name: Pininyahang Manok
author: Vanjo Merano
step1: - 2 lbs chicken cut into serving pieces
step4: - 1 cup bell pepper cut into thick strips
f1: Step 1: Marinate the chicken in pineapple juice/concentrate (derived from the can of pineapple chunks) for 20 to 30 minutes
f2: Step 2: Pour the cooking oil in a cooking pot / casserole then apply heat
f3: Step 3: Sauté the garlic, onion, and tomatoes
f4: Step 4: Put-in the chicken and cook until color of the outer part turns light brown
f5: Step 5: Add the pineapple juice/concentrate marinade and fresh milk then bring to a boil
f6: Step 6: Add the pineapple chunks and simmer until the chicken is tender and half of the liquid evaporates (about 20 to 30 minutes).
f7: Step 7: Put-in the carrots and simmer for 5 minutes
f8: Step 8: Add the bell pepper and fish sauce then simmer for 3 minutes
f9: Step 9: Remove from the cooking pot / casserole and transfer to a serving dish.

name: Sweet Chicken Asado Recipe
author: Vanjo Merano
f1: Step 1: Rub salt all over the chicken. Let it stay for 10 minutes.
f2: Step 2: Heat the cooking oil in a wide cooking pot.
f3: Step 3: Pan-fry both sides of the chicken in medium heat for 5 minutes per side.
f4: Step 4: Scoop out the excess oil. Add the garlic and cook until light brown.
f5: Step 5: Pour-in the soy sauce and chicken broth. Stir and let boil.
f6: Step 6: Put-in the 5 spice powder and star anise. Cover and simmer for 30 to 35 minutes. Note: Add water if needed.
f7: Step 7: Add-in the sugar and ground black pepper. Stir.
f8: Step 8: Transfer to a serving bowl. Serve.

name: Sweet and Sour Chicken Nuggets
author: Vanjo Merano
step2: - 1 1/2 cup sweet and sour sauce use half of the amount in the recipe link
step3: - 1 tablespoon chopped curly parsley for garnish
f1: Step 1: Make the chicken nuggets by following the recipe on the link in the ingredients section. Set Aside.
f2: Step 2: Make the sweet and sour sauce by following the sweet and sour sauce recipe link in the ingredients section. Make half amount of what is written in the recipe.
f3: Step 3: Arrange the chicken nuggets in a serving plate. Pour the sweet and sour sauce over the chicken nuggets. Garnish with chopped parsley.
